dn27:8.3: kosalassa anuyuttā → anantarā anuyuttā (bj, mr); anantarā anuyantā (sya-all)
dn27:11.7: khuddamadhuṁ → khuddamadhu (bj, pts1ed); khuddaṁ madhuṁ (mr) | aneḷakaṁ → anelakaṁ (pts1ed)
dn27:12.2: Yato kho te → yato kho (si, sya-all, pts1ed)
dn27:13.2: rasapathaviṁ paribhuñjantānaṁ → etthantare pāṭho sya-all, pts1ed potthakesu natthi | vaṇṇavevaṇṇatā → vaṇṇavevajjatā (ṭīkā)
dn27:16.12: asuci → vasalī (bj, mr); vasali (sya-all) | asucī → vasalī (bj, mr); vasali (sya-all)
dn27:18.7: candimasūriyā → … suriyā (bj, sya-all, pts1ed) | Sayaṁpabhāya → tāya (bj)
dn27:22.1: sattānaṁyeva → te sattānaṁyeva (cck, sya1ed); tesaṁ sattānaṁyeva (sya2ed); tesaṁ yeva kho vāseṭṭha sattānaṁ (pts1ed)
dn27:22.10: paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantī’ti → paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti (bj, pts1ed); paṇṇakuṭīsu (sya-all); paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantīti kho (mr)
dn27:22.11: jhāyantīti kho → jhāyantīti kho pana (bj, pts1ed); jhāyanti te kho (sya-all)
dn27:23.4: Na dānime → na dānime jhāyanti na dānime (bj, pts1ed, mr)
dn27:24.1: visukammante → vissutaṁ kammante (bj, pts1ed); vissukammante (si); visuṁ kammante (sya-all, mr)
